physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a tall building in the background. There is a shorter part of the building that extends outwards and into the foreground of the photograph. There is a line of bushes in front of the building. To the left of the photograph, there is a banner bearing Chinese characters.
title_text: Cathay Building during the Japanese Occupation Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
